verses.content: Abraham chun nuhmei dang a nei a, a hming chu Ketura a nih.
Ama chun Zimran, Joksan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak le Suah a neipêk a.
Joksan chun naupasal Sheba le Dedan a nei a. Dedan naupasalhai chu Assurim, Letusim le Leummim an nih.
Midian naupasalhai chu Epha, Epher, Hanok, Abida le Eldaa an nih. Chuong po po chu Ketura nauhai an nih.
Abraham chun a nei po po Isak kuomah a pêk a.
A thaikêm naupasalhai kuoma ruok chun lâwmmanhai a pêk a; chun, ama la dam lai ngei chun a naupa Isak kuoma inthawk chun, saktieng, khawsak ramah, ân fe hmangtir tâwl tah a.
Abraham dam sûng chu kum za khat le sâwmsari le panga a nih.
Abraham chun a thlarau ân thla tah a, a lua kêlsam ṭo hiela tartakin, tarkûna damin a thi tah a, a chipuihai kuoma ṭhuoiin a um ve tah a.
A naupasalhai Isak le Ismael chun Hit mi Zohar naupa Ephron loa, Mamre zâwna Makpelaa pûka chun an vui tah a;
chu lo chu Abrahamin Heth thlahaia inthawka ân châwk kha a nih. Chutaka chun Abraham chu an phûm a, a nuhmei Sara le khan.
Abraham thi hnung chun Pathienin a naupa Isak chu mal a sâwm a; chu Isak chu Beer-lahai-roi kâwla chun a um a.
Hieng hi Abraham naupa Ismael, Sara suoknu Aigupta mi Hagarin Abraham a neipêk thlahai chu an nih.
Hieng hi an pieng dân indawt ang peia Ismael naupasalhai hming chu a nih: Ismael nau lutîr chu Nebaioth a nih, chu dawta chun Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
Misma, Duma, Massa,
Hadad, Tema, Jetur, Naphis le Kedema an nih.
Chuong chu Ismael naupasal- hai an nih, an khuo ang pei le an riebûk ang peia an hming ziek a nih: an chi ang pei chun lal sâwm le pahni an nih.
Chun, Ismael dam sûng kum chu hi hi a nih, kum za le sâwmthum pasari hi: chun, a thlarau ân thlah a, a thi tah a, a chipuihai kuoma ṭhuoiin a um ve tah a.
Chun, a thlahai chu Havilaa inthawkin Assuria pan zâwngin Aigupta zâwn Sur chenin an um a, a unau po po epa chun a um a.
Chun, hieng hi Abraham naupa Isak thlahai chu an nih:
Abraham chun naupasal Isak a nei a, Isak chu Paddan-aram rama Suria mi Bethuel naunu, Suria mi Laban farnu Rebeka chu nuhmeia a nei lai chun kum sâwmli mi a nih a.
Chun, a nuhmei chu a ching leiin, Isak chun LALPA kuomah a ngênpêk a, LALPAIN a hnina chu a lo ngaipêk a; chuongchun, a nuhmei Rebeka chu ân rai tah a.
A nau vawnhai chu phîng sûnga chun an insuol a; ama chun, “Hieng ang hi a ni si chun iengdinga ka dam zing am a na?” tiin LALPA indawn dingin a fe tah a.

Chun, LALPAIN a kuomah, “I sula chun chi hni an um a, I phîng sûnga inthawk ngei chun hnam hni inṭhêng an ta, Hnam pakhat chu hnam pakhat nêk chun hrât lem a ta; A upa lemin a naupang lem rawng chu bâwl a tih,” a tih a.
Chun, a nau nei a hun chun, ngai ta, a sula chun inphîr an lo um a,
a hmasa lem chu sentakin, puon inhmul anga inhmul thuopin a hung suok a; chuongchun, a hmingah Esau an sak tah a.
Chu zoa chun a unaupa chu a hung suok a, a kutin Esau kekhawng chu a chel zing a; chuongchun, a hmingah Jakob  an sak a: Rebekain anni a nei lai chun Isak chu kum sâwmruk mi a nih.
Chun, naupanghai chu an hung inṭhang lien a, Esau chu sapêl thiemtak, ramsuok mi tak a nih; Jakob ruok chu mi totak, puon in dâma um mi a nih.
Isak chun a sakhi sa a fâk hlak leiin Esau chu a ngaina hle a; Rebeka ruok chun Jakob chu a ngaina lem a.
Vawikhat chu Jakob chun ieng- khat a lo suonghruoi a, Esau chu rama inthawkin a hung a, a châu hleh a.
Esau chun Jakob kuomah, “Lunginsiettakin i iengkhat sen suong hruoi kha, kha ngei kha mîn fâktir raw khai, ka ṭâm êm el,” a ta (chuleiin, a hming chu Edom an ti a nih).
Jakob chun, “I nau lutîr nina mîn châwktir zet la tie,” a ta.
Chun, Esau chun, “Nih e, ka thi vâng vâng a ni sih a, nau lutir nina el hi ka ta dingin ieng am ṭhahnem chuong a ta?” a ta.
Jakob chun, “Ka kuomah inkhâm zet raw le,” a tih a: chun, a kuoma chun ân khâm tah a, a nau lutîr nina chu Jakob kuoma chun a zawr tah a.
Chun, Jakob chun Esau chu bei le havai suong hruoi chu a pêk a; chuongchun, a fâkin a dâwn a, a tho a, a fe tah a. Chuong ang chun Esau chun a nau lutîr nina chu a ngainêp a nih.
